CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Origin) = $Label.CAS_Origine_Web, IMAGE('/resource/origine_web','Web',30,30), IF( TEXT(Origin) = $Label.CAS_Origine_Appel_Entrant, IMAGE('/resource/origine_telephone','Phone',30,30), IF( TEXT(Origin) = $Label.CAS_Origine_Appel_sortant, IMAGE('/resource/origine_telephone','Phone',30,30), IF( TEXT(Origin) = $Label.CAS_Origine_Email, IMAGE('/resource/origine_mail','Email',30,30), "" ) ) ) )
